wikipedia_page.main: Clive Fiske Harrison (born 23 November 1939) is an English stockbroker. He is the chairman of Fiske plc, an independent stockbroking firm based in London.

link_mentions.page: List of University of Cambridge people
response: *Clive Fiske Harrison (Trinity Hall), investment banker, Chairman of Fiske plc.

He is the youngest son of Clive Fiske Harrison.Winter, Laura. "Clive Fiske Harrison" . Debrett's People of Today 2012Fiske Harrison of Layer de la Haye Burke's Peerage His brother Jules William Fiske Harrison was, according to The Times, a "skilled and fearless skier" who died in a skiing accident in Zermatt, Switzerland in 1988.Coren, Giles. 'How do I hate skiing?', The Times 21 March 2009 He sits on the boards of the historic City of London stockbrokers Fiske & CoCompanies House: "Fiske PLC" and Bragg, Stockdale, Hall & Co, founded in 1819.Bragg, Stockdale, Hall & Co website
